New Records: India registered their 11th straight win in T20Is.
Key Match Events: Shreyas Iyer scored an unbeaten 74 off 44 balls.
Dasun Shanaka scored an unbeaten 47 off 19 balls.
Pathum Nissanka top-scored for Sri Lanka with 75 off 53 balls.
India chased down the target of 184 with 17 deliveries to spare.
Rohit Sharma was dismissed for 1 by Dushmantha Chameera.
Ishan Kishan was dismissed for 16 by Lahiru Kumara.
Venkatesh Iyer caught Danushka Gunathilaka off Ravindra Jadeja's bowling.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a chilly Saturday evening in Dharamsala.
The Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association Stadium was 50 percent full.
